code: import React from"react";import Button from"react-bootstrap/Button";import Card from"react-bootstrap/Card";import img from'../assets/news.jpg';import"./items.css";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Items=_ref=>{let{title,description,url,urlToImage,publishedAt,author,source}=_ref;let localTime=new Date(publishedAt).toLocaleTimeString();let localDate=new Date(publishedAt).toLocaleDateString();return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Card,{className:"news-card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Card.Header,{className:"card-header",children:source}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Card.Img,{className:"news-img img-fluid",variant:"top",src:urlToImage?urlToImage:img,alt:"image from source"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Card.Body,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Card.Title,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("b",{children:title})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Card.Subtitle,{className:"mb-2 text-muted",children:author?"Author: ".concat(author):"Author: Unknown"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Card.Text,{className:"text-start mt-3",children:description}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:url,target:"_blank",rel:"noreferrer",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{className:"mt-3",onClick:()=>{window.location.href=url;},variant:"dark",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("b",{children:"Read More"})})})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Card.Footer,{className:"bg-success card-footer text-white",children:["Published on: ",localDate," at ",localTime]})]});};export default Items;
